verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that God <S%H430><s%> did test <S%H5254><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H85><s%>, Abraham: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold, here I am.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Take now <S%H3947><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%>, yours only <S%H3173><s%> son Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, whom you love <S%H157><s%>, and get you <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Moriah <S%H4179><s%>; and offer him <S%H5927><s%> there for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> upon one <S%H259><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> which I will tell you of <S%H559><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and saddled <S%H2280><s%> his donkey <S%H2543><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of his young men <S%H5288><s%> with him <S%H3327><s%>, and Isaac his son <S%H1121><s%>, and split <S%H1234><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> for the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of which God <S%H430><s%> had told him <S%H559><s%>.
Then on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his young men <S%H5288><s%>, Abide <S%H3427><s%> ye here with the donkey <S%H2543><s%>; and I and the lad <S%H5288><s%> will go <S%H3212><s%> yonder <S%H3541><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%>, and come again to you <S%H7725><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> it upon Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>; and he took <S%H3947><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and a knife <S%H3979><s%>; and they went <S%H3212><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them together <S%H3162><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Here am I <S%H1121><s%>, my son. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold the fire <S%H784><s%> and the wood <S%H6086><s%>: but where is the lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>?

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, My son <S%H1121><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> will provide <S%H7200><s%> himself a lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>: so they went <S%H3212><s%> both of them <S%H8147><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him of <S%H85><s%>; and Abraham built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H6186><s%>, and laid the wood <S%H6086><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%>, and bound <S%H6123><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> him on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon <S%H4605><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> stretched forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> the knife <S%H3979><s%> to slay <S%H7819><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto him out of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Lay <S%H7971><s%> not yours hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%>, neither do you <S%H6213><s%> any thing <S%H3972><s%> unto him <S%H6258><s%>: for now I know <S%H3045><s%> that you fear <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, seeing you have not <S%H3808><s%> withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%>, your only son from me <S%H3173><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and behold behind <S%H310><s%> him a ram <S%H352><s%> caught <S%H270><s%> in a thicket <S%H5442><s%> by his horns <S%H7161><s%>: and Abraham <S%H85><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and offered him up <S%H5927><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Jehovah <S%H3070><s%>–jireh: as <S%H834><s%> it is said <S%H559><s%> to this day <S%H3117><s%>, In the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> it shall be seen <S%H7200><s%>.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%> out of heaven <S%H8064><s%> the second time <S%H8145><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%>, By myself have I sworn <S%H7650><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, for because <S%H3282><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>, and have not <S%H3808><s%> withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%>, your only son <S%H3173><s%>:

That in blessing <S%H1288><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you <S%H7235><s%>, and in multiplying I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and as the sand <S%H2344><s%> which is upon the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H8193><s%>; and your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%>;
And in your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%>; because <S%H834><s%> you have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>.

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto his young men <S%H5288><s%>, and they rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to Beer <S%H884><s%>–sheba; and Abraham <S%H85><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> at Beer <S%H884><s%>–sheba.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H4435><s%>, Milcah, she has also born <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> unto your brother <S%H251><s%> Nahor <S%H5152><s%>;
Huz <S%H5780><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and Buz <S%H938><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Aram <S%H758><s%>,
And Chesed <S%H3777><s%>, and Hazo <S%H2375><s%>, and Pildash <S%H6394><s%>, and Jidlaph <S%H3044><s%>, and Bethuel <S%H1328><s%>.

And Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> fathered <S%H3205><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>: these eight <S%H8083><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> did bear <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor <S%H5152><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>.

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Reumah <S%H7208><s%>, she bare <S%H3205><s%> also Tebah <S%H2875><s%>, and Gaham <S%H1514><s%>, and Thahash <S%H8477><s%>, and Maachah <S%H4601><s%>.
